Html: When clicking the Printer Friendly link at the bottom of the Events.aspx page and News/View.aspx, the resulting page retains css formatting from the master stylesheet. This worked better in V2-Beta 2 (no background image) so I tried using that Print.master and print.css file, but I got the same results so I'm not sure where that formatting is coming from. I'll continue to work on a fix, but thought I'd pass it along to those much smarter than I.
We just need to change the Print.master file to inherit the Print.css file or maybe just put the style right into the masterpage.

Change line 1 of /news/print.aspx

TO

<%@ Page Language="VB" Theme="" EnableTheming="false" MasterPageFile="~/Print.master" Title="Untitled Page" %>

...or get later Set. :)
